Bay Bridge Celebration

Wordpress Site Development

Bridge troll, smash.

In 2013, the eastern span of the Bay Bridge that connects San Francisco and Oakland is nearing completion. But problems remain unresolved...

Request:
Create site for The Bay Bridge Re-opening Celebration.

Solution:
Responsive theme and Wordpress site development.

Technologies:
Wordpress, JS, HTML, CSS, LAMP.

Backstory:
This site never went public, and the big celebration never happened. At the time, there were reports of the bridge re-opening being delayed due to construction issues, reported here. The celebration plans were subsequently scrapped along with all the work we did on the site.
